    • expandEnvVars

      protected static String expandEnvVars(String pathName, Map<String,String> envVarMap)
      Replace any environment variables with the corresponding value in the supplied file path
      Parameters:
      pathName - File path
      envVarMap - Environment variable map
      Returns:
      File path with any environment variables replaced with the variable's value; blank if the file path is null or blank

    • restoreEnvVars

      protected static String restoreEnvVars(String pathName, Map<String,String> envVarMap)
      Replace any portions of the specified file path that match an environment variable value in the supplied map with the corresponding variable name
      Parameters:
      pathName - File path
      envVarMap - Map containing environment variables and their corresponding values
      Returns:
      File path with any portions that match an environment variable value in the supplied map replaced with the corresponding variable name; blank if the supplied file path is null of blank
